website_summaries.verdict: With an attractive design, solid build, and plenty of storage room, this toy box has it all. Without question the best toy box currently on the market.
pros: Sturdy wood construction is capable of handling years of enthusiastic use
Beautifully crafted to complement any room
Lid features child-safe hinges to protect little fingers
Multipurpose design doubles as a bench
cons: Heavier than less substantial toy boxes

customer_reviews.title: Get it, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: It's real wood, not pressed. The color is more "cherry" than espresso, just what I was looking for. The door has a stopper so once opened it won't slam down, perfect for little hands. It fits a nice amount of toys, it's also a comfy bench for little ones. Very sleek looking, I love it. My 16 year, who has never put anything together in his life before, finish it in half an hour. Very nice piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Karlsonisepik

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to assemble, it's just very well designed. All the pieces lined up perfectly, it's a parent's dream to put together. Good quality materials, also. It doesn't quite hold an adult's weight but only because the gap in the front which is there so your kid can't get trapped.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Smythe

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Two people are needed for the assembly. When a piece broke during the process we called the company and had replacement parts shipped to us in 3 days. They were very courteous. One tip for assembly: Put a little WD-40 on the ball and socket parts on the safety hinges before snapping them together.
customer_reviews.author: Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and holds more than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy box that will grow with my son! It holds a lot more than I expected. There were complaints about a weak base, but we've not had any problems to date. There were also complaints about it not being sturdy. I think that the sturdiness depends on how well you put it together. Our 2-year-old son loves going into his toy box to get his toys. We love that it is safe (doesn't close fast/hard) and holds his toys. We've gotten lots of compliments, as it looks great in our family room. I'll probably add a cushion, but that's not a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: NCMom1317

customer_reviews.title: Pretty toy chest
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the toy chest as it is heavy and the finish is nice. However, the door is hydraulic like and it made me nervous when my grandson would reach in for a toy. The door is sturdy enough to come down on the head and neck area when he bent in that he could hurt himself. We had to do a work around to make the top stay open even when he would pull on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrill

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Quality Inspection
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak for the product itself as every piece came scratched or bent. It was an open box item described as the packaging was damaged. Amazon obviously didn't bother to inspect the contents of the box because that is the most inaccurate description. The nails, screws, wheels were in a grocery bag and had opened in the box. The wood was chewed up and some parts were left attached and were bent. I've never been so dissatisfied with a purchase before. It is on its way back.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: not going to break, tons of storage, not too hard to build.
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't too hard to put together, with instructions compared to other products, it was almost easy. It's very strong and my kids can't dump it out. It has wheels! Easy to open for kids and it looks beautiful. Also it has a huge amount of storage compared to most to boxes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Toy Chest
customer_reviews.text: This toy chest is very good quality and was easy to put together (for someone like me who is horrible at putting things together). My only complaint is that the color of this toy chest is labeled as "espresso", but it has more of a cherry red color to it. So it doesn't match the rest of the furniture I have in my daughters room, but I'm hoping I can disguise that some how.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Brady

customer_reviews.title: Can’t put it all together!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Got it together the problem I gave it I couldn’t put the wheels on because one of the holes are to big for the screw in the wheel and I don’t know who to contact to fix this issue
customer_reviews.author: tonya welcome

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today and I’m already writing a review. So far so good. The little one loves it! As you can see from the picture, two people are sitting on it (granted one’s tiny) but it didn’t budge. Also, his older brother made this so it’s pretty easy instructions. It has wheels so it’s easy to move around and it looks pretty cute and chic. So far, it’s definitely worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Liked
customer_reviews.text: Received it was scratches on it but it’s hold a lot and so far has been perfect for what we need. Nice to have an extra seat in the living room and hide toys!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Love this chest!
customer_reviews.text: This chest is alot bigger than it seems & holds all of my sons toys inside. Its sturdy, had a soft close, holds open on its own, is cut infront to not smash my sons fingers & it has wheels!!! I love this toy chest, its definitely one of my best purchases!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Best toy box
customer_reviews.text: Such a well made toy box. The lid doesnt close on you either, it stays up. No finger squishing. Best toy box I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality.
customer_reviews.text: It looks really nice and it has wheels so it's really easy to move around. The lid also stays open if you need it to which is a nice feature. The only downsize was that it was one of the worst things I have ever had to put together. It was a huge pain. Might be worth it for you to pay to have it assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren J Klein

customer_reviews.title: It looks very nice and is worth the money spent
customer_reviews.text: It took awhile to assemble this. It looks very nice and is worth the money spent. I would recommend this to anyone looking for an inexpensive toy chest.
customer_reviews.author: MTK

customer_reviews.title: Solid wood, great finish, sturdy piece
customer_reviews.text: This toy chest was well thought out. All solid wood, strong and good looking. The cover has struts to assist with opening and closing, it will not slam down on fingers. It will require assembly.
customer_reviews.author: FJhobie

customer_reviews.title: Build to last
customer_reviews.text: Had it for over 2 years and works like the day I put it together. Thinking of getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie ula

customer_reviews.title: Quality wood scratches easy
customer_reviews.text: This toy chest is just what we needed to reduce the clutter of our daughters toys. Great quality wood, and easy to put together! Have noticed it scratches easily though.
customer_reviews.author: Trav

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it — a good buy
customer_reviews.text: My son assembled it without a problem although he’s very handy. Truly designed for toddlers. It protects those little fingers, is roomy for his toys, small and large, and is attractive. It can be used later for storage, strong enough to sit on by an average adult. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: A Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Kiddraft toy chest
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to put together. We have it in our diningroom where we watch our grandkids. It is a good looking piece of furniture. The top hinges appear to be well made, the top stays up when opened. Our 1 year-old grandchild can easily open it. We're very pleased with how it looks and works.
customer_reviews.author: ralphod100

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, great features, and movable
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughter's room and she immediately figured out how to open and close it. Since she is under 2 she doesn't understand the concept of holding the top up while digging so it's a great feature that the top stays up wherever she leaves it. I don't have to worry about her fingers getting hurt. Also the top down is a nice area for her to do her puzzles or whatever she is playing with at the time. For me, I had to move this to the hallway temporarily and it was so easy to just roll (and not having to wait for my husband to help me). Thought the price was reasonable enough.
customer_reviews.author: TravelMom

customer_reviews.title: No durable
customer_reviews.text: One year after I got this how the finish started to call off. No kids in this house. Not durable at all.
customer_reviews.author: kevin w uhl

customer_reviews.title: Love this toy chest
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this toy box instead of the others I was checking out. It holds a lot of toys and my daughter loves to sit on the top too. Very good investment
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is big and perfect! Fits lots of toys and is a beautiful mahogany color as described. My husband and I had it out together in a half hour.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelynjazzytoes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful toy box!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy box to have when my granddaughter visits. Since it's in my living room, I wanted something that looks like a nice piece of furniture. And this really looks beautiful and is very well made. It's quite roomy inside as well and will hold a lot of toys. It was also easy to put together. I'm so happy with this toy box and I would recommend it highly!
customer_reviews.author: NyYankee Fan

customer_reviews.title: This toy box is a nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: This toy box is a nice piece of furniture. Our granddaughter enjoys sitting on it as much as she loves opening to get toys. Easy ordering, delivery and assembly. Maybe we’ll purchase for other grabdbabies.
customer_reviews.author: Linda E McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this and was very easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Napolsky

customer_reviews.title: Love..
customer_reviews.text: Love...Love....Love this toy chest. Very easy to assemble if you follow directions well. My young daughters (6 & 9 yrs) helped and had a blast with the mommy-daughter project for their baby brother. The chest holds more than I expected. And my favorite feature...the soft closed lid so my son doesn't smash his fingers when he closes it. Great buy....
customer_reviews.author: S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, nice finish, worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Took approximately 45 minutes to put it together with no help and very little tools. The product is sturdy and has a nice finish, making it blend well with any living room. Our daughter is 17 months old and is able to open/close the lid with ease. The gap in front of the box, where the lid closes, is a smart move as it prevents little fingers from getting jammed, if your child attempts to close it fast. Overall a great product and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ganapathi Venkatesh

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this but it came damaged. Lots of scuffs and scratches but the biggest issue was a completely split side. I’m returning it and have reordered it. I’ll update this if the new one comes in acceptable condition.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Scruff

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: A few stratches and minor chip but other wise ok
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Well made Product
customer_reviews.text: Hydraulic lid, and wheels. Kids sit on it to put their shoes on every morning, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Your Mom

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy box to match my KidKraft table & chairs set. Together they don't take up much room in my eating area but look nice, are perfect for seating four toddlers (not for long of course). The box provides additional seating and stores a lot of toys. I may put separators inside because the box is so big that kids are tempted to just dump everything in it. Quality product that looks nice in a home that adults want to enjoy too.
customer_reviews.author: Birte P

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made and easy to put together. Matches my son's Espresso furniture nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 9th purchase of this item for Grandbabies
customer_reviews.text: I've given one of these toy chests to each of my Grandbabies at birth. They have all held up well and they get a lot of use from storing toys to being lined up and pushed across the floor as train cars in imaginative play. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy Box
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy box for the price. Our son loves sitting on top of it and playing with his toys. So far no fingers have been pinched (including ours) and it holds all of his small to medium sized toys. It was easy to assemble. I think we had it put together in an hour. The only issues that we have had was the initial smell out of the box (which dissapated quickly) and a few scratches from our son playing on it. I think we're going to cover the seat part with a fathead just to protect it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina L. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great toy chest
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful toy chest.perfect size for my kids fnafs plushies (five night at freddy) and his titan superheroes..and he has A LOT.. But i think for me the best part is that it is on wheels so easy to roll out of way for cleaning around
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Safety hinge breaks quickly, making it unsafe!
customer_reviews.text: After only 3 months the ‘ safety hinge that prevents lid from dropping’ broke and hurt my daughters arm. Horrible, unsafe product and would not buy again. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer freeberg

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice toy chest. Good quality materials for the price. Easy to assemble. I did put small felt pads on the lid to protect little fingers.
customer_reviews.author: D. Long

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Liked the 1st one so much we bought another!
customer_reviews.author: D. Torrey

customer_reviews.title: Best toy chest out there!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely best toy chest ever!! Very classy and very durable! Easy to roll around if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna May

customer_reviews.title: Just like pictured by Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece of furniture. My daughter loves it. Easy to put together. I would buy it again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy box!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice toy box! We bought this for our son, who is two months old, because we know that shortly down the road his toys will begin to take over our house. We wanted a toy box that can be used for other things when he gets older (blankets, other storage, etc) so we decided to go with this one. The espresso wood matches the furniture in my son's room almost perfectly and it's definitely not cheaply made. It's not difficult to assemble however an extra set of hands might be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great toy bin fits all the toys used once every ...
customer_reviews.text: Great toy bin fits all the toys used once every night to put all her toys away lol she takes then all out n puts a pillow in there n hides no pinched fingers and she can breathe while in there it's safe.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a great toy box, love it! The only drawback is the price is so high .
customer_reviews.author: Tanlee

customer_reviews.title: Easy assemble
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy hold my toddler toys with no problem and coordinates with the living room furniture so that he can stay busy while we read a book. It's an easy assemble. It rolls around on the floor and carpet with ease. The only huge problem that i have , when i opened the box with my child the strong aroma from the finish was over baring for an adult so i know it was too strong for a child. It was disappointing because my chid wanted to help with the assembly but couldn't due to the strong finishing smell. Other than that, its a descent toy trunk...
customer_reviews.author: Loso The Great

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews about this being hard to put together before I bought this and I was nervous but my husband is quite handy so I bought it anyway. I'm glad I did. This was the easiest thing I've ever seen him put together. You need your own wrench and Alan key set because the junk they give you for tools sucks. Other than that, took 20 minutes and is super cute!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Fusaro

customer_reviews.title: Storage capacity good
customer_reviews.text: Good product it wasn't easy to assemble but it wasn't hard either.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. K Jones Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Toy Box
customer_reviews.text: This product is EXACTLY what we needed! Very easy to put together and I like how the hinge for the top stays open so it doesn't slam shut on little hands. Definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ldyngt k

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: gift for toys and little people like to play inside too - hinges very safe - no slamming down
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl S.

customer_reviews.title: very nice decorative piece and suits the purpose perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking toy trunk on wheels and it is very practically. It offers a lot of space for the toys. I have it in my living room, it is such a nice decorative piece and it suits the purpose just perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put together. I did it by myself. There are sometimes thar two sets of hands would be easier. Very sturdy and I love the safe close lid. It can hold a lot of toys.
customer_reviews.author: Juju

customer_reviews.title: Big enough!
customer_reviews.text: Big enough to fit a good amount of toys !
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful toy box
customer_reviews.text: This is nicely made and solid. I like that the lid goes down slowly to prevent little fingers from getting pinched. It is a great toy chest for my son and looks perfect with the other wood furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, holds LOTS of toys, and is really good quality. I also love that it has the safety feature built in so it doesn’t slam down on our son’s fingers. Definitely recommend/would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality piece and not too hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to store toys in our living room area. It fits right along with our furniture. Very good quality piece and not too hard to assemble. This is the second one we've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Santrich

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice product. Easy to put together if you follow ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice product. Easy to put together if you follow the instructions. Sturdy, nice solid wood, nice features, like slow closing lid and wheels. We are really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Best toy box great deal
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I ever bought for someone even though the person is a bitch
customer_reviews.author: CAROL LILICK

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Easy for 2 people to move around ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Easy for 2 people to move around with the hand holes on each side even full of toys.
customer_reviews.author: Ffej

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, toddler friendly lid
customer_reviews.text: The wheels are an added bonus. I can move the toy box around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Brown

customer_reviews.title: Does the job it was intended to do
customer_reviews.text: i love that it has the hydraulic assists to the lid. even with some mild weight on it, my two year old can open and close it with ease, and wont get her hands or head caught in it
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great toy box
customer_reviews.text: Great toy box! I love the way the lid doesn't slam shut. Holds a lot of toys and looks great in our sunroom, just like a nice piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: VaBeachMomma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for price. Just right height for my toddler to get toys out of.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy box
customer_reviews.text: We bought this toy box for our daughter for Christmas when she was a little over 1 yr. It looks great in our living room, makes a nice little seat for kids to sit on & holds a decent amount of toys. My husband put it together in about 30 min or less & said it was easy. Love that it has rollers on the bottom, makes it easy to move & clean around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love that it has hydraulics in the lid
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has hydraulics in the lid! No stress of our lil man getting his fingers pinched in the lid, or of it slamming down on his hands! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Boorman

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice looking toy box and I love that it has a seat. I feel that it is a great value for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Trice

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This is so gorgeous in person I almost cried when I first opened the box!
customer_reviews.author: Jill F.

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty expensive for a toy chest
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty expensive for a toy chest, that's my only complaint. The wood is fairy good quality, and assembly takes about an 40 minutes even if you're quick at putting stuff together. Cosmetically, the screw heads are visible from the outside of the chest so it's not "discrete" in its build. The hydraulics in the lid are a wonderful feature that make it very quiet to open and close, and also keeps fingers from getting smashed.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but scratches too easily
customer_reviews.text: The wood scratches too easily to be a child's piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy chest
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy chest for my grandsons room. Nice quality and easy to put together. I love the safety feature when it opens and closes....
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Toy box suited for grandparents’ loft - nice piece of furniture as well as practical
customer_reviews.text: Great toy box - grandkids love it and it looks terrific in our loft - we now have three to accommodate the kids toys when they are over
customer_reviews.author: Robert Danna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy box. It looks nice and was easy to put together. It has been in my eight year old's room for over a year now, and still looks just as nice as when we set it up. Very good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: katydid

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece and it matches my granddaughter's furniture
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece and it matches my granddaughter's furniture. The top doesn't slam, so her fingers are never in danger. It's roomy and on wheels...perfect! Alert: requires assembly! But you'll be pleased, trust me!
customer_reviews.author: L. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: This is the best toy chest we ever got
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toy chest we ever got. Real solid wood with a furniture like quality I went back and ordered another one
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: easy assembly. great quality lots of storage.
customer_reviews.text: Great toy chest. assembly was easy as could be love that it has rollers. excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bud

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it I have bought one for each of my grandchildren (4). Durable and very roomy. The kids love to sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: DJM

customer_reviews.title: Toy Chest
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. The quality is very good. I feel more than comfortable sitting on it and my two year old plays in it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Wainwright

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For my granddaughter and she and her parents just loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this box. Looks great. A nice piece of furniture for my grandaughter
customer_reviews.author: lorraine gangemi

customer_reviews.title: KidKraft toy box
customer_reviews.text: This toy box was a present to my grandson and he, as well as my daughter loves it. The wheels allows for easy moving when it's time to vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a gift and it's a beautiful sturdy piece.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: Sit & store
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! It has so much storage space as well. The kids love it as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! And so does my 8mo old! great gift from her grandparents
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid hinges
customer_reviews.text: The lid hinges, they stop and don't fall hard. So no smashed fingers. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great quality, the girls love
customer_reviews.text: bought one for each of my grandbabies, great quality, the girls love them
customer_reviews.author: Janis S.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous toy chest
customer_reviews.text: My man had no problem assembling this. I absolutely love it so perfect . Matches my crib as well. Looks very classy, big too. Has safety latches so baby canno t slam the lid down hard as well as a space in front which prevents smashed fingers. Cannot say enough good things about it . Great price AND free shipping. Arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a bit shallow, but beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I had nothing to do with assembly- my husband did it while I was at work and said "it sucked." He is a contractor and used a drill so I don't know what that means for people who don't have a lot of skill with power tools. I CAN say it's beautiful- we have it in our living room and it coordinates wonderfully with our furniture. Also, little one has not yet pinched a finger and he's two. There's a gap where the lid shuts in front, which makes a front pinch impossible. The capacity isn't that great... Or maybe we just have too many toys!
customer_reviews.author: JDubRN13

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice piece of furniture. High quality wood. Very sturdy. Lid very safe with a type of hydraulic hinges. Bought for my granddaughter and she loves it. It's really a nice looking toy box.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: KidKraft Limited Edition Toy Box - Espresso
customer_reviews.text: it was an excellent choice for a Christmas gift for our grandson. He can put his toys in it and sit on it! So easy to put together that our daughter in law did it herself
customer_reviews.author: marlene mckane

customer_reviews.title: Upscale piece
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and has a fine piece of furniture feel. Very nice wood, should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: clay keeling

customer_reviews.title: Great buy...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very sturdy... my 2 yr old so broke his last two toy boxes.... this one is holding up perfectly... money well spent...
customer_reviews.author: Jerk

customer_reviews.title: Great toy box
customer_reviews.text: Great toy box. Very large. Seems sturdy, made with all wood. Looks good too. I have it in my living room & you wouldn't think it is just a toy box. Fairly easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Well built and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most well made pieces of non solid wood furniture I have ever put together. The instructions are easy to understand and are on larger pieces of paper compared to most furniture. The hardware is well made and I had no issues with assembly. Sipping was only $6.95 for me because it shipped from Dallas (100 miles away) and arrived 1 1/2 days after I ordered it. In fact, I received a notice from Amazon at it had shipped 12 hours after it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding design and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Top of the line quality and appealing design! Very happy with this toy chest!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Salcido

customer_reviews.title: Petite, but sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy product and fairly easy to put together. I like the fact that it doesn't slam, and the fact the little fingers won't get crushed in the event that it gets shut on them. It was a bit smaller than I imagined, even if I knew the specs. Somehow, my brain pictured something a bit bigger - but that's on me. Overall, very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Toybox
customer_reviews.text: Well built...easy for grand-daughter to open and not be afraid of pinching her fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Lois Payne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful toy box for my baby's room. I had not trouble putting it together myself without any help from my husband! The hinges were so easy to install and work like a charm. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: JMF

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and it is used as a child's toy box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and well built toy chest
customer_reviews.text: I gave this toy chest to my grandbaby for christmas. It was a little more expensive ordering it from Amazon, but I knew it would arrive when stated it would and I have not been disappointed with anything I have ordered from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: B A

customer_reviews.title: it was very easy to assemble even came with extra parts just in ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help store my toddlers many new toys after Christmas...it was very easy to assemble even came with extra parts just in case and I love the quality of the wood, very sturdy material! I love how it slides slowlt6and catches as you close do it won't slam on little fingers!
customer_reviews.author: Jacky Rodes

product_meta.title: KidKraft Limited Edition Toy Box - Espresso
product_meta.description:
Our Limited Edition Toy Chest keeps rooms tidy with style. This chest would be a great addition to any kid's room. 33.07"Lx18.38"Wx27.75"H Seat:16.38"H.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Our Limited Edition Toy Chest keeps rooms tidy with style. This chest would be a great addition to any kid's room. Convenient storage. Doubles as a bench for extra seating. Flip-top lid has safety hinge to protect young fingers from getting pinched. Available in white, black, natural, cherry and honey. Made of wood.
feature_bullets: Doubles as a bench for extra seating
Flip-top lid has safety hinge to protect young fingers from getting pinched
Available in white, black, natural, cherry and honey
